import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import img from "../image/cardLogo.png" function Home() { const [card, setCard] = useState([]) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const [postPerPage, setPostPerPage] = useState(3); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products`) .then(res => res.data) .then(res => setCard(res)) }, []) console.log(card) const lastPostIndex = currentPage * postPerPage; const firstPostIndex = lastPostIndex - postPerPage; const currentPost=card.slice(firstPostIndex,lastPostIndex) let page return (
{ currentPost.map((a, b) => (
{a.title}
